General.Name: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate development company in Thailand. It operates through Real Estates sales; Rental and Rendering of Services; and Consulting and Management Service segments. The company develops and sells single detached houses, townhomes, and condominiums, as well as home offices; and rents office and technical buildings. It also provides consulting and management services. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4.Name: Mr. Somboon  Kuptimanus
4.Title: Head of Compliance, Chief Legal Officer & Company Sec.
